mapper.select: select * from (select e.name, d.name as department, e.position, e.email, d.location, e.qr_path, e.img from (SELECT name, dep_id, position, email, qr_path, img from EMPLOYEE where username = #{username}) e JOIN DEPARTMENT d ON e.dep_id = d.id) a CROSS JOIN (select i.name as manager from EMPLOYEE i where dep_id IN (SELECT dep_id from EMPLOYEE where username = #{username}) and role = '1') b;
mapper.update: UPDATE EMPLOYEE set password = #{password} where username = #{username};
